titleStmt.title: A breathing after God. Or a Christians desire of Gods presence. By the late reverent and worthy divine Richard Sibs, Doctor in Divinity, master of Katherine Hall in Cambridge, and sometime preacher of Graies-Inne
titleStmt.author: Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Dawson for R. M[abb] and are to be sold by Thomas Slater, at the Swan in Duck-lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
